5f2e9977298aafc89d38cc872ff3cd7a469935799ec2d1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://dcfe931ec8e0a4869e88c48d4940ab829e69347c29667d5f1db54414b0fc937f","dweb:/ipfs/QmVY8NUngkJGzrk4bjmUDLvutaf5X1qHSw8UkQw25GeNbo"]}},"version":1}

fulfillRandomWords(uint256,uint256[]).details: Fulfills a random words request with the provided random words. Can only be called by the verifyRand contract.

params._randomWords: The array of random words to fulfill the request with.
params._requestId: The request ID for the random words.

getRequestStatus(uint256).details: Returns the fulfillment status and the random words of a request.

params._requestId: The request ID for which the status is requested.

returns.fulfilled: A flag indicating whether the request is fulfilled.
returns.randomWords: The random words generated for the request.

initialize(address,address).details: Initializes the contract with the initial owner and verifyRand address.

params._verifyRandAddress: The address of the verifyRand contract for fulfilling random words.
params.initialOwner: The address that will own the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestRandomWords(uint256,uint256).details: Requests random words by providing a request ID and the number of words requested. Can only be called by the owner.

params._numWords: The number of random words requested.
params._requestId: The request ID for the random words.

setVerifyRand(address).details: Sets a new verifyRand address. Can only be called by the owner.

params._verifyRandAddress: The new address of the verifyRand contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only verifyRand can call this function"

arguments.value: Only verifyRand can call this function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only verifyRand can call this function"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier to ensure that only the verifyRand contract can fulfill random words.
